content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Maryam Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Maryam, I'm glad you're interested in my apartment. Let's negotiate the price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I believe this well-located, modern apartment offers a great value. However, as a student with a limited budget, I must seek an affordable option. With this in mind, I propose starting the discussion at 550 Euros per month, hoping it can be our mutual basis for further negotiations.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: That's a low starting point, Maryam. I'm sure you understand that my goal is to rent out my apartment for the highest price possible. I reject your proposal with a counteroffer of 800 Euros per month.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for sharing your perspective, but as I mentioned earlier, my financial circumstances require an economical solution. I would like to continue the discussion but cannot move beyond 625 Euros monthly. If we fail to reach an agreement at this price, I will have to search elsewhere.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I understand your position, Maryam. However, I do not want to continue the negotiation, because the price you are offering is way too low for me. I am not willing to accept less than 800 Euros per month.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: In that case, I respect your decision and will look for alternative accommodations that better align with my budget. Thank you for your time regarding the apartment listing. TERMINATE
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran
